hadiths.text: Narrated Abdullah ibn Umar: The people looked for the moon, so I informed the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) that I had sighted it. He fasted and commanded the people to fast

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي شَهَادَةِ الْوَاحِدِ عَلَى رُؤْيَةِ هِلاَلِ رَمَضَانَ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding The Testimony Of A Single Person About Seeing The Crescent Of Ramadan
